name: simd_int2
desc: A vector of two 32-bit signed integer elements.

items.desc: Returns the absolute value of each element in a vector.

items.desc: Returns each element in a vector clamped to a specified scalar range.

items.name: func simd_equal(simd_int2, simd_int2) -> simd_bool
items.desc: Returns true if every element in a vector is exactly equal to the corresponding element in a second vector, and otherwise returns false.

items.name: func simd_any(simd_int2) -> simd_bool
items.desc: Returns true if the high-order bit of any element is set; false otherwise.

items.name: func simd_all(simd_int2) -> simd_bool
items.desc: Returns true if the high-order bit of every element is set; false otherwise.

items.name: func simd_bitselect(simd_int2, simd_int2, simd_int2) -> simd_int2
items.desc: Returns a vector that contains elements from either the first or second parameter, based on the corresponding element in the third parameter.
